Sorry, 

     Due to events beyond my control and my rising responsibilitie=
s in
other areas I am forced to leave the game. 

It has been fun playing w=
ith all of you, and perhaps I will be able to
check on you. I really enjoye=
d the freedom here to create different
characters, and run interesting idea=
s and plots. I will miss that.

I recognize that I have several plot lines =
running. 

To help close keep in mind the characters I played: Rodimus, Sco=
rponok
and Lord Elder belonged  to Robo. I had also promised him Cyc and
Sc=
ourge as well. So please consider them open for play, but return
them to hi=
m when and if he should return. 

As to who can lead the Maximals - I will =
leave that up to you folks. 

As to Cyc and Scourge - If you like just assu=
me they leave the
fortress. Remember they currenly have no leader right now=
, and will
only follow a proven stong leader, most prefferably a unicronian=
 or a
previous unicronian minion (Like galvatron) . . . or perhaps a megs i=
n
a pinch. 

Anyways, what you do is up to you, I leave them all in your ca=
pable
hands.  

Sorry I have to go in such a fashion :( 

Preston
